install.title: 1. Install Deno
install.description: If Deno is not installed, run: curl -fsSL https://deno.land/x/install/install.sh | sh

deploy.title: 3. Launch & Customize
deploy.description: Navigate to the project directory and run: cd my-website && deno task dev, then edit configuration files in the docs directory
